dcterms:description: A dataset used for full-reference image quality assessment, containing various distorted images for evaluating image quality algorithms.

dcterms:description: A dataset for full-reference image quality assessment focusing on the most apparent distortion and the role of strategy in image quality evaluation.

dcterms:description: An image database designed for image quality assessment, containing various types of distortions and providing a comprehensive evaluation of image quality metrics.

dcterms:description: A large-scale image quality assessment dataset specifically designed for perceptual image restoration, including a variety of distortions, particularly those generated by GANs.
